item.title: SMU Upsets No. 21 Arizona in Holiday Bowl, Snaps 5-Game Postseason Losing Streak
item.description: Quarterback Kevin Jennings threw for 278 yards, highlighted by an 80-yard completion on the second play from scrimmage, to lead the Mustangs past the ...

item.title: No. 13 Nebraska Survives Against No. 9 Michigan State to Stay Undefeated
item.description: Thanks to a tie-breaking Rienk Mast three-pointer, the Cornhuskers edged the Spartans to extend the longest active winning streak in the nation.

item.title: No. 17 Arizona Wildcats vs. SMU Mustangs Highlights | FOX College Football
item.description: Check out the best moments between the Arizona Wildcats and SMU Mustangs in the Holiday Bowl.

item.title: Bruce Thornton Moves Up Ohio State Scoring List in Victory Over Rutgers
item.description: The Buckeyes senior is inching closer to Jim Jackson in the program's record books following a 20-point double-double against the Scarlet Knights.

item.title: Nate Bittle, Takai Simpkins Combine for 32 Points in Oregon's Win vs. Maryland
item.description: The Ducks shot nearly 50% from the floor to earn a conference win over the Terps on Friday night.
